#FL	j	k	x1	x2	x3	x4
# FL  count of fragments with a given length
# j   fragment length
# k   number of fragments of length j
# x1   number of fragments of length j with a 5' C->T 
# x2   number of fragments of length j with a 3' G->A 
# x3   number of fragments of length j with a 5' C->T 
# x4   number of fragments of length j with a 3' G->A
